name: specialist-doctor-website
description: -   [Description](#description) -   [Installation Requirement](#installation) -   [Technology Used](#technologies) -   [Authors Info](#author-info) -   [License](#License) ## Description This is a Platform for Specialist Doctors to showcasing their services and enable patients to book appointment with any Doctor of their choice ## Installation ### Requirements -   Either a computer,phone,tablet or an Ipad -   An access to the Internet ### 1. Local Repository -   Make sure you have a stable internet to have the ability to clone the repository. -   Type the following command in your terminal to clone this repository ``` git clone https://github.com/danielngetich/specialist-doctor-website.git ``` If you are using SSH, use the following command ``` git clone git@github.com:danielngetich/specialist-doctor-website.git ``` When you run the commands successfully, you should have a local version of this repository. ### 2. Online Repository -   Make sure you have a stable internet for forking this repository. -   According to the license, you can fork this project. You need it click on the forking icon and it will be added as one of your repositories Happy coding! ## Technologies * HTML5 * CSS3 * Javascript
